text: New York State Rifle & Pistol Association, Inc. v. Bruen, 597 U.S. ___ (2022) , abbreviated NYSRPA v. Bruen, also known as NYSRPA II or Bruen (to distinguish it from the 2020 case), is a landmark decision of the United States Supreme Court about the Second Amendment to the United States Constitution. In a 6â€“3 decision, the majority ruled that individuals can carry concealed guns in public in June 2022. ==References== Category:June 2022 events Category:2022 in the United States Category:United States Supreme Court cases
title: New York State Rifle & Pistol Association, Inc. v. Bruen
